recipe.title: Peppermint Hibiscus Tea Recipe by Tasty

ingredients.ingredient: ½ cup ; hibiscus flower, dried ; (20 g)

steps.step: Combine the peppermint leaves, rosehips, and hibiscus flowers. Store in an airtight container for up to 1 month.
To brew, steep 1-2 teaspoons of the tea blend in 8 ounces (240 ml) of hot water for 5 minutes. Serve warm or over ice.
